title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Microscopy; chromosome staining schedules; study of mitosis and meiosis; differential staining of euchromatin and heterochromatin; chromosome staining by fluorescence dye; photomicrography and dark room techniques. Isolation of genomic DNA; quantification of DNA; restriction digestion; agarose gel electrophoresis; Isolation and analysis of RNA. Southern blotting.
